# Assistants started

Really happy to have hired two highly qualified editorial assistants: Stephanie Kobakian and Mitch O'Hara-Wild from Monash University. This is the summary of progress to date:

- Assistant Editor checklist created, and used on first batch of submissions
- Editor checklist created
- Suggestions list for revising author guidelines 
- `rj` package usage documentation begun
